blocks.name: cdir
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of directed sets.

blocks.name: ctail
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the tail function for directed sets.

blocks.name: df-dir
blocks.content: Define the class of directed sets (the order relation itself is sometimes called a direction, and a directed set is a set equipped with a direction). (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: df-tail
blocks.content: Define the tail function for directed sets. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: isdir
blocks.content: A condition for a relation to be a direction. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isdir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cuni(c0)))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cdir, wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))), wa(wa(wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0)), wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0))
  releq(cv(hs0), c0)
  sseq12d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c2), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  reseq2d(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  coeq12d(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseq12d(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  coeq12d(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccnv(c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-dir(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
}

blocks.name: reldir
blocks.content: A direction is a relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: dirdm
blocks.content: A direction's domain is equal to its field. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirdm(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdir), wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
} = {
  eqssd(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
  sstri(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  ssun1(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5eqssr(cuni(cuni(c0)), cdm(c0), cdm(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dmresi(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cdm(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), cdm(c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0))
  simplrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wrel(c0), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  dmss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dirdm(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ DirRel → dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0)
} = {
  eqssd(dom(c0), ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  a1i(c0 ∈ DirRel, dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  sstri(dom(c0), ⋃ ⋃ c0, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  ssun1(dom(c0), ran(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5eqssr(⋃ ⋃ c0, dom(c0), dom((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dmresi(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ DirRel, dom((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0))⊆ dom(c0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)
  simplrd(c0 ∈ DirRel, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0, Rel(c0), ((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)∧((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  dmss((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0)
}

blocks.name: dirref
blocks.content: A direction is reflexive. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirref(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
} = {
  impel(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c0, c1), wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1))
  ssbrd(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1, c0, wcel(c0, cdir))
  eqsstrd(cres(cid, c2), c0, cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  reseq2d(cid, c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  syl5eq(c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), cdm(c0), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dirdm(c0)
  simplrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wrel(c0), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  mpbiri(wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1), wceq(c1, c1))
  eqid(c1)
  anidms(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))
  resieq(c1, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dirref(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c0]c1)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
} = {
  impel(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, c1[c0]c1, c1[(= |` c2)]c1)
  ssbrd(c1, (= |` c2), c1, c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  eqsstrd((= |` c2), c0, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  reseq2d(cid, c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  syl5eq(c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, dom(c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dirdm(c0)
  simplrd(c0 ∈ DirRel, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0, Rel(c0), ((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)∧((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  mpbiri(c1 ∈ c2, c1[(= |` c2)]c1, c1 = c1)
  eqid(c1)
  anidms(c1 ∈ c2, (c1[(= |` c2)]c1 ↔ c1 = c1))
  resieq(c1, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: dirtr
blocks.content: A direction is transitive. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirtr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1))), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
} = {
  an32s(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
  imp31(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
  mpdd(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdir), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe))), wrel(c0))
  reldir(c0)
  anim12d(wrel(c0), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  ex(wrel(c0), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wcel(c3, universe))
  brrelex1(c0, c3, c4)
  ex(wrel(c0), wbr(c4, c0, c1), wcel(c4, universe))
  brrelex1(c0, c4, c1)
  com4t(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
  3expia(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c0, cdir), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1))))
  syl5(w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdir), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cdir), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
  simprld(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  spc3gv(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, universe, c4, universe, c1, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
  imbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(c3, c0, c4)))
  breq12(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1), c4, c0)
  3adant1(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(c4, c0, c1)))
  breq12(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs2), c1, c0)
  3adant2(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
  breq12(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs2.w(wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dirtr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2)∧(c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1))→ c3[c0]c1)
} = {
  an32s(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, (c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1), c3[c0]c1)
  imp31(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1), c1 ∈ c2, c3[c0]c1)
  mpdd(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1), (c1 ∈ c2 → c3[c0]c1), (c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌))
  syl(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→(c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌)), Rel(c0))
  reldir(c0)
  anim12d(Rel(c0), c3[c0]c4, c4[c0]c1, c3 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(Rel(c0), c3[c0]c4, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1(c0, c3, c4)
  ex(Rel(c0), c4[c0]c1, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1(c0, c4, c1)
  com4t(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1), (c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌), c1 ∈ c2, c3[c0]c1)
  3expia(c3 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c2, (c0 ∈ DirRel →((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1)))
  syl5((c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ DirRel, ((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))))
  sylib(c0 ∈ DirRel, ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ∀(hs2,((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2)))), (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
  simprld(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0, (Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0), (⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)∧((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  spc3gv(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, universe, c4, universe, c1, c2, ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)→ hs0[c0]hs2), ((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1))
  imbi12d((hs0 = c3 ∧ hs1 = c4 ∧ hs2 = c1), (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), hs0[c0]hs2, (c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1), c3[c0]c1)
  anbi12d((hs0 = c3 ∧ hs1 = c4 ∧ hs2 = c1), hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, c3[c0]c4, c4[c0]c1)
  3adant3(hs0 = c3, hs1 = c4, hs2 = c1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ↔ c3[c0]c4))
  breq12(hs0, c3, hs1, c4, c0)
  3adant1(hs0 = c3, hs1 = c4, hs2 = c1, (hs1[c0]hs2 ↔ c4[c0]c1))
  breq12(hs1, c4, hs2, c1, c0)
  3adant2(hs0 = c3, hs1 = c4, hs2 = c1, (hs0[c0]hs2 ↔ c3[c0]c1))
  breq12(hs0, c3, hs2, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1))
  diff.hs1.w(((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1))
  diff.hs2.w(((c3[c0]c4 ∧ c4[c0]c1)→ c3[c0]c1))
}

blocks.name: dirge
blocks.content: For any two elements of a directed set, there exists a third element greater than or equal to both. Note that this does not say that the two elements have a _least_ upper bound. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  3impib(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))))
  syld(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c3, cuni(cuni(c0)))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c3, cuni(cuni(c0))))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  eleq2d(c3, c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wcel(c1, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c3, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, cuni(cuni(c0)), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cdir), wral(hs0, cuni(cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, cuni(cuni(c0)), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  simprrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  codir(hs0, hs1, s0, cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0)), c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, cuni(cuni(c0)), c3, cuni(cuni(c0)), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cv(s0))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs1), c3, c0, cv(s0))
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, cdir), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))))))
  eximdv(s0, wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))))
  ancrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  adantrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syld(wcel(c0, cdir), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cdir), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cdir), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c0)), wrel(c0))
  reldir(c0)
  relelrn(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  sseld(cv(s0), crn(c0), c2, wcel(c0, cdir))
  syl5sseqr(crn(c0), c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  sstri(crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  ssun2(crn(c0), cdm(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5eq(c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), cdm(c0), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dirdm(c0)
  df-rex(s0, c2, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wex(s0, wa(wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cdir)
  diff.cdir.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dirge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ DirRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0))), d(s0, c2))
  3impib(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)))
  syld(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), (c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0))
  anbi12d(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, c3 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eleq2d(c1, c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  eleq2d(c3, c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0), ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0,(hs0[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0)))))
  sylib(c0 ∈ DirRel, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ⋃ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0,(hs0[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0)))), (⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))
  simprrd(c0 ∈ DirRel, (⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0), (Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0), (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
  ibi(c0 ∈ DirRel, ((Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)∧((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  codir(hs0, hs1, s0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c3, ⋃ ⋃ c0, ∃(s0,(hs0[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0)), ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0)))
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = c1, (hs0[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0), (c1[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c1, hs0[c0]s0, hs1[c0]s0, c1[c0]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c1, c0, s0)
  exbidv(s0, hs1 = c3, (c1[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0), (c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c3, c1[c0]s0, hs1[c0]s0, c3[c0]s0)
  breq1(hs1, c3, c0, s0)
  syl6ibr(c0 ∈ DirRel, ∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c2 ∧(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0))))
  eximdv(s0, c0 ∈ DirRel, (c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)))
  ancrd(c0 ∈ DirRel, (c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0), s0 ∈ c2)
  adantrd(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1[c0]s0, c3[c0]s0, s0 ∈ c2)
  syld(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1[c0]s0, s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  ex(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1[c0]s0, s0 ∈ ran(c0))
  sylan(c0 ∈ DirRel, c1[c0]s0, s0 ∈ ran(c0), Rel(c0))
  reldir(c0)
  relelrn(c0, c1, s0)
  sseld(s0, ran(c0), c2, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  syl5sseqr(ran(c0), c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ DirRel)
  sstri(ran(c0), ⋃ ⋃ c0, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  ssun2(ran(c0), dom(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5eq(c2, ⋃ ⋃ c0, dom(c0), c0 ∈ DirRel)
  dirdm(c0)
  df-rex(s0, c2, (c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, ⋃ c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ hs1[c0]s0)))
  diff.hs1.w(∃(s0,(c1[c0]s0 ∧ c3[c0]s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cdir)
  diff.cdir.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tsrdir
blocks.content: A totally ordered set is a directed set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm tsrdir(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(c0, cdir))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  jca(wcel(c0, ctsr), wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0))
  jca(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cps))
  pstr2(c0)
  eqsstr3d(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), cxp(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  sqxpeqd(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  simpld(wcel(c0, ctsr), wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, cps))
  psdmrn(c0)
  sstrd(cxp(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), cun(c0, ccnv(c0)), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(cxp(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)), cun(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(c0, cps))
  istsr(c0, cdm(c0))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  unssd(c0, ccnv(c0), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  eqsstr3d(c0, ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), ccom(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wceq(ccom(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), c0), wrel(c0))
  relcoi2(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(ccom(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), ccnv(c0)))
  syl5eqssr(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  cnvresid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(ccnv(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), ccnv(c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0))
  cnvss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)
  coss1(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), ccnv(c0), c0)
  syl5eqssr(ccnv(c0), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), ccom(ccnv(c0), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0))))), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  ax-mp(wceq(ccom(ccnv(c0), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0))))), ccnv(c0)), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  relcoi1(ccnv(c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(ccom(ccnv(c0), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0))))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0)))), c0))
  eqsstr3d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0)))), c0, cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  reseq2d(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0))), wcel(c0, ctsr))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wceq(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0)))), wrel(c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wrel(c0), wcel(c0, cps))
  psrel(c0)
  relcnvfld(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, ctsr), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wcel(c0, cps))
  tsrps(c0)
  syl6eqssr(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0, cin(c0, ccnv(c0)), wcel(c0, cps))
  psref2(c0)
  inss1(c0, ccnv(c0))
  coss2(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(ccnv(c0)))), c0, ccnv(c0))
  isdir(c0, ctsr, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tsrdir(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TosetRel → c0 ∈ DirRel)
} = {
  mpbir2and(c0 ∈ TosetRel, c0 ∈ DirRel, (Rel(c0)∧(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0), ((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧(⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0)))
  jca(c0 ∈ TosetRel, Rel(c0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)
  jca(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0, (⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0, c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  pstr2(c0)
  eqsstr3d((⋃ ⋃ c0 × ⋃ ⋃ c0), (`' c0 ∘ c0), (dom(c0)× dom(c0)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  sqxpeqd(dom(c0), ⋃ ⋃ c0, c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  simpld(c0 ∈ TosetRel, dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0, ran(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ ran(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  psdmrn(c0)
  sstrd((dom(c0)× dom(c0)), (`' c0 ∘ c0), (c0 ⋃ `' c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  simprbi(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (dom(c0)× dom(c0))⊆(c0 ⋃ `' c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  istsr(c0, dom(c0))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  unssd(c0, `' c0, (`' c0 ∘ c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  eqsstr3d(c0, (`' c0 ∘ c0), ((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)∘ c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, ((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)∘ c0)= c0, Rel(c0))
  relcoi2(c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, ((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)∘ c0)⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ `' c0)
  syl5eqssr((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), `' c0, `'(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  cnvresid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, `'(= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ `' c0, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0)
  cnvss((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0)
  coss1((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), `' c0, c0)
  syl5eqssr(`' c0, (`' c0 ∘ c0), (`' c0 ∘(= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0)), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  ax-mp((`' c0 ∘(= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0))= `' c0, Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  relcoi1(`' c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (`' c0 ∘(= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0))⊆(`' c0 ∘ c0), (= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0)⊆ c0)
  eqsstr3d((= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0), c0, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  reseq2d(cid, ⋃ ⋃ c0, ⋃ ⋃ `' c0, c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, ⋃ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ ⋃ `' c0, Rel(c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, Rel(c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  psrel(c0)
  relcnvfld(c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0)⊆ c0, c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  tsrps(c0)
  syl6eqssr((= |` ⋃ ⋃ c0), c0, (c0 ⋂ `' c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel)
  psref2(c0)
  inss1(c0, `' c0)
  coss2((= |` ⋃ ⋃ `' c0), c0, `' c0)
  isdir(c0, ctsr, ⋃ ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ ⋃ c0)
}
